this_title: Glow Up: Britain's Next Make-Up Star Season 3
trans_title: 化妆界明日之星 第三季
introduction: The make-up competition returns for a third series. The MUA class of 2021 are set their first Professional Assignment - a beauty campaign for high street retailer Superdrug and Creative Brief - a unique look that tells a story.
chinese_title: 化妆界明日之星 第三季
foreign_title: Glow Up: Britain's Next Make-Up Star Season 3
